alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:00AM EST until January 12 at 6:15AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM EST FOR CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHERN TRIMBLE COUNTIES... At 600 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Madison, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Jefferson and northern Trimble Counties, including the following locations... Middlefork, Hanover, Volga, North Madison, Kent, Manville, Trout, Belleview, Bryantsburg and Madison Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
